title: Business Feature: The provisioning manager can schedule the installation and the installation call, NetCracker automatically deploys the required configuration as soon as the devices are visible
description:
Description
The Business Feature: The Business Feature: xx is to be implemented in Q1/2023.
In preparation, however, the following enablers are to be implemented beforehand in Q4/2023:
Enabler: Implement Template Handling in SNow@TC  https://jira.devops.telekom.de/browse/SNOWTC-10875 
Enabler: Implement Service Inventory Link to external SIM management  https://jira.devops.telekom.de/browse/SNOWTC-10876 
Enabler: Implement SOM for Template based definitions https://jira.devops.telekom.de/browse/SNOWTC-10877
